structure.unit: Registration Of Certain Professions And Occupations

law.catch_line: Charging And Collection Of Fees By Board Of Real Estate Appraisers
law.text: The board shall charge and collect fees as determined by the commissioner of administration and finance in accordance with the provisions of section three B of chapter seven. The board shall collect such additional fees as are required by the Federal Appraisal Subcommittee pursuant to Title XI and shall transmit such additional fees to the Federal Appraisal Subcommittee on an annual basis or more frequently as required.
